Articles.Content:
[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/85147-TAC-containers-by-R-R-Dynamics-Inc](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/85147-TAC-containers-by-R-R-Dynamics-Inc)

These are just parts with good looking models for TACLS since 0.24, and I believe it should work the current version of KSP and TACLS if the cfg can be touched up, perhaps with an MM patch. I would do it myself if I know how. But since I do not, I respectfully request for someone with freetime to just poke around and see what they can do. I will learn from the examples.
I'll do it, I wanna learn modding and this'll let me ignore relearning blender for the time being.
